attributes.action: MPs & Electoral Commission to review misleading referendum campaign claims
attributes.additional_details:
While this petition respects the democratic process in the United Kingdom, the foundation of a true democracy is honest campaigning such that voters are properly aware of the implication of their vote.

Key leave campaign claims/implied claims should be investigated:

http://indy100.independent.co.uk/article/8-of-the-most-misleading-promises-of-the-vote-leave-campaign-ranked-in-order-of-preposterousness--WyxD59VO3Nb
attributes.background:
This petition contends that the EU referendum was campaigned in a deliberately misleading manner and that the result should therefore be evaluated prior to Article 50 being triggered.

If it is found that EU referendum campaigns were deliberately misleading, the result should be reviewed.
